summary: Summary Objective: To successfully implement my communication and engineering skills into a strong and growing company.
skills: Fire safety and security systems (Fire Alarm, CCTV)
Reading technical drawings and wiring diagrams
Safety compliance and regulatory knowledge (National Electrical Code)

experience.title: Director of Engineering
experience.description: Familiar with hotel mission and standards; maintenance of kitchen and refrigeration equipment; troubleshooting and repair of commercial laundry; read and interpret technical information; manage maintenance staff; plan, schedule, and supervise; supervise tasks and projects; maintain safety compliance; oversee emergency and security systems; provide training; coordinate with vendors; budget and manpower planning; on-call manager on duty.

experience.title: Director of Engineer
experience.description: Oversee day-to-day operations of engineering; lead teams across multiple kitchens and restaurants; safety and sanitation inspections; manage inventories; oversee 400 guest rooms, pools, spas, laundries, boilers, chillers, generators; manage budgets; staff training; safety compliance; coordinate with property operations on Paradise Island; maintain capital and engineering budgets.

experience.title: Chief Engineer
experience.description: Evaluate electrical systems; install/repair electrical and air conduction systems; mentor maintenance staff on safety; develop positive customer relationships; monitor generator load; contribute to company's star rating.

education.degree: Course: Revisions for the National Electrical Code, loads, Service, and Over current Protection

certifications: Ritz Carlton Hotel Training: Management Course
